ChocolateyPrototypeBootstrap.Name: Ensure
ChocolateyPrototypeBootstrap.Description: Says whether the Chocolatey Prototype provider is installed on the machine.

ChocolateyPrototypeBootstrap.Name: InstallScope
ChocolateyPrototypeBootstrap.Description: Scope to install the provider. System wide or user scope

ChocolateyPrototypeBootstrap.Name: RunKey
ChocolateyPrototypeBootstrap.Description: Key to uniquely identify the configuration item.

NugetBootstrap.Name: Ensure
NugetBootstrap.Description: Says whether the NuGet provider is installed on the machine.

NugetBootstrap.Name: InstallScope
NugetBootstrap.Description: Scope to install the provider. System wide or user scope

NugetBootstrap.Name: RunKey
NugetBootstrap.Description: Key to uniquely identify the configuration item.

ChocolateyInstall.Name: Ensure
ChocolateyInstall.Description: Specifies whether the Chocolatey Software should be installed on the machine or not.

ChocolateyInstall.Name: InstallDir
ChocolateyInstall.Description: Folder path wherethe Chocolatey Software should be installed.

ChocolateyInstall.Name: ChocoInstallScriptUrl
ChocolateyInstall.Description: Optional Install script URL to download and execute to install Chocolatey Software. Leave unset to use the embedded version.
